body.directions: Listen to the audio, and then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following will you most likely find where the word in the audio indicates?
body.answer: Audio for 老师 lǎoshī
options: Audio for 医生 yīshēng
Audio for 服务员 fúwùyuán
Audio for 外公 wàigōng
body.correct: Wonderfully done! 学校 xuéxiào means “school,” and you are most likely to find teachers there. Maybe not a waiter or waitress.
body.incorrect: Very close. Listen to the word, think about what place it refers to, and then consider which professional works there.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be completed with the word in the audio?
body.answer: 我_____我的学校 Wǒ _____ wǒde xuéxiào.
options: 我_____我爷爷奶奶 Wǒ _____ wǒ yéye nǎinai.
你的姐姐很_____。 Nǐde jiějie hěn _____.
请给我一杯_____。 Qǐng gěiwǒ yībēi _____.
body.correct: Outstanding job! 到达 dàodá means ”to arrive,” and you can use it to complete the sentence “我到达我的学校。 Wǒ dàodá wǒde xuéxiào. (I arrive at my school.)
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio again, and understand the word’s meaning. Next, review all the incomplete sentences in the choices, and then see which one the word fits for both meaning and structure.

body.quiz: Which of the bold type characters in the following words has the same initial as the word in the audio?
body.correct: Terrific job! The word 去 qù (to go to) in audio has initial “q,” while the character 前 in the word 以前 qián (in the past) has the same initial.
body.incorrect: Not quite… Listen to the word in the audio again, and then identify its final. You will then sound out the words in the choices to see which one has the same final.

body.quiz: Which of the following is the antonym (word with opposite meaning) of the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 晚 wǎn
options: Audio for 热 rè
Audio for 瘦 shòu
Audio for 丑 chǒu
body.correct: Beautifully done! The word 早 zǎo means “early,” and its antonym (word with opposite meaning) should be 晚 wǎn (late).
body.incorrect: Not quite… Listen to the word in the audio again, and think about its meaning. Then consider what its opposite meaning should be, and compare it with the words in the choices.

body.quiz: Which of the following situations do you least need to do as indicated by the word in the audio?
body.answer: To sleep in on a Sunday morning
options: To go to my doctor’s appointment
body.correct: Excellent job! The word 准时 zhǔnshímeans “on time”. You should be on time most of the time, except, of course, when you are sleeping in on a Sunday morning.
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the word in the audio again and think about its meaning. Then consider in what situation you would not need to do as it indicates.
